BodyName: Committee on Fire and Criminal Justice Services

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the Department of Correction to make its electronic database of people buried at Hart’s Island, since 1977, available on its website.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring the Dept of Correction to make its electronic database of people buried at Hart’s Island, since 1977, available on its website.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the Department of Correction to put its Hart’s Island visitation policy in writing, post it on its website, and make it available to anyone who requests a copy.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring the Dept of Correction to put its Hart's Island visitation policy in writing, post it on its website, and make it available to anyone who requests a copy.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the Department of Correction to make its electronic database of people buried at Hart’s Island, since 1977, available on its website.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring the Dept of Correction to make its electronic database of people buried at Hart’s Island, since 1977, available on its website.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the Department of Correction to put its Hart’s Island visitation policy in writing, post it on its website, and make it available to anyone who requests a copy.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring the Dept of Correction to put its Hart's Island visitation policy in writing, post it on its website, and make it available to anyone who requests a copy.
